special:
The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:
In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
threat: A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the Tomcat server to stop responding, resulting in a denial of service.
A remote attacker could possibly use this flaw to inject a request that would get executed with a victim's credentials.
This could allow a remote attacker to possibly obtain sensitive information.
